DOC.brief_summary: To assess pharmacokinetics AZD1656 coadministration Simvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: Study To Assess Pharmacokinetics AZD1656 During Coadministration With Simvastatin
DOC.criteria: Patients clinical diagnosis T2DM least 1 year , treat metformin metformin one oral antidiabetic drug ( OAD ) Body mass index great equal 19 less equal 42 kg/m2 HbA1c great 6.5 % enrollment Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge Investigator , within 2 week first administration IP Significant cardiovascular event within last 6 month prior enrollment ( eg , myocardial infarction/acute coronary syndrome , revascularisation procedure , stroke transient ischaemic attack ) heart failure New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class IIIIV
